subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Matt Caddell caught a 4-yard touchdown pass in the corner of the end zone from John Parker Wilson with eight seconds remaining, lifting Alabama to a 41-38 victory over No. 16 Arkansas last night, for the first major victory for Nick Saban as the Crimson Tide coach.
